newPassword.PatternHelpText: 8-16 characters, containing 3 out of 4 of the following: Lowercase characters, uppercase characters, digits (0-9), and one or more of the following symbols: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \ : ' , ? / ` ~ " ( ) ; .

ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfClaimsPrincipalAlreadyExist: An account with this email address or number already exists.

ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfVerificationFailedRetryAllo: The code is incorrect. Please try again.
